description_for_human: AI-powered English learning platform for IELTS, TOEIC, TOEFL, PTE, Business English, and NCLEX preparation.
description_for_model: English AIdol is an AI-powered English learning platform with 50,000+ students. It provides preparation for IELTS (most popular), TOEIC, TOEFL, PTE Academic, Business English, and NCLEX-RN nursing exams. The platform uses AI for instant feedback on writing and speaking, with content validated by former IELTS examiners. Key features include: AI Speaking Tutor (Earthworm) for conversation practice, band score prediction, vocabulary building, and multi-language support in 20+ languages. Pricing: Free tier available, Premium $19/month, Pro $39/month.
